descriptions: ["DescriptionOffering undisputed stunning views, exclusivity and soothing ambiance of the island, this residential plot is perfect for turning your dream home into a reality.Contact LLJ - Your Saadiyat Island Experts for more details at +97124950700 / whatsapp us on +971508186893 or email us at customerservice@lljproperty.com .SAADIYAT ISLANDSituated 500m off the cost of mainland Abu Dhabi it has 27km2 of beautiful beaches, premium residential properties, 5* hotels, cultural experiences, educational centres & extraordinary architecture.
